      • loadData

        public org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.impl.GLMRegressionModel.SaveLoadV1_0.Data loadData(SparkContext sc,
                                                                                   String path,
                                                                                   String modelClass,
                                                                                   int numFeatures)
        Helper method for loading GLM regression model data.
        Parameters:
        modelClass - String name for model class (used for error messages)
        numFeatures - Number of features, to be checked against loaded data. The length of the weights vector should equal numFeatures.
